rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with broad access ramp leading into the main living area. Designed to be spacious for ease of movement and adherence to Vastu, aligning with the auspicious directions.

rooms.name: Living Room & Library Combo
rooms.description: A multipurpose space serving as the living area and integrated library. The room incorporates an open design with bookshelves along one wall to allow natural light from windows aligned with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: An open-plan kitchen adjoining the living area with wheelchair-accessible design. Countertops and storage are at reachable heights, ensuring ease of movement.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair-accessible bathroom with grab bars and a low threshold. Designed to ensure privacy and safety while adhering to Vastu principles regarding the placement of water features.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Wide door for wheelchair access with a ramp leading to the entrance hall. The main entry is oriented towards the auspicious east as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Living Room Windows
openings.description: Large windows providing ample natural light and ventilation, aligned with Vastu to ensure a positive energy flow in the living area.

openings.name: Kitchen Windows
openings.description: High windows for ventilation and natural light while ensuring privacy and compliance with Vastu.
